content.raw:
Since `None` just get converted to `RELWITHDEBINFO` for MSVC, we don't have to worry about accounting for it in this loop.

Although we could choose to keep this here anyway, since it doesn't cost much and it may be slightly more robust in the future (although a more robust solution might be to have an explicit list of supported build types somewhere in our cmake scripts).
